attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: It glitches all the time and kicks me out of the app whenever I try to do something, do not recommend.

attributes.title: Don’t get😱✨
attributes.review: After downloading this app I turned orange and it gave me explosive diarrhea. Also my hair started falling out😾 I also kept seeing this witch in my dreams😱😡 I hate this up with a passion!!

attributes.title: smelly

This app made my phone reset and it asked personal questions, this app is horrible and almost broke my phone, this app needs to be taken down, smh it’s bad 🍊😷

attributes.title: Trash utter garbage 🤮
attributes.review: The app literally keep shutting down and I don’t know if it’s my phone BUT to be a president I expect better quality👎🏾I’m am so disappointed. Take this off the App Store IMMEDIATELY

attributes.title: horrible app!!!
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE!!!! the directions are not clear and the organization of the app is unacceptable. i thought this app from the PRESIDENT would be high quality but i was wrong!!

attributes.title: 🤮🤮 this app makes me sick
attributes.review: this app is not good! i’m not kidding when i say it made me sick!! i’m sitting on the toilet typing this because it gave me D I A R R H E A ! my skin started turning ORANGE as soon as i opened the app!! ahh!! do not download it’s an awful app!!

when i downloaded this app i thought i was going to get to meet my orange 🍊 peachy 🍑king 👑 but all i got greeted with was his face on a screen waving but not at me😖also there are a bunch of racists knocking at my door ready to attack but have no fear, ik what will make them retreat...actually i don’t please send help:) my fellow orange loving friends who are also disappointed by this app shall save me 🤩

attributes.title: Horrible, do not download
attributes.review: This app hacked my phone and made it glitch so bad. It also uses your camera and microphone without permission. I believe this app is stealing info.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app causes so much pain to family’s all over the US. This man puts children in cages, and is racist. Also when u download it theirs a faint orange scary man that dances out side ur door screaming it’s very annoying
